QuestData.Title: Black Wagon Flight
QuestData.Description:
With the oathstone empowered once more, we must now transport the future of our kind to the Life Pools. It is the right of every true dragonflight to have their eggs nurtured by its waters.
Unfortunately, our enemies will be watching the skies, now that we have revealed ourselves. We will make the final leg of the journey on foot to avoid their scrutiny.
Meet me near the Obsidian Bulwark, $c. As the Life-Binder's champion, you are welcome to join me in this.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort the eggs to the Life Pools.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Sabellian atop the Ruby Lifeshrine.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Sabellian to begin moving the eggs
